title: Jürgen Siebert
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Writers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writers) : Jürgen Siebert**

Marketing director for [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) [Germany](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022220/http:/www.fontshop.de/) and publisher of [Fontblog.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022220/http:/www.fontblog.de/).
author: Stephen Coles
